nodes.text: Jake Rodgers is an artist that worked on the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and its first two expansion packs as art director. He also wrote the introduction for the art book From Pencil to Pixel: The Art of Star Wars Galaxies which was included with every collector's edition of the game. His username on Sony's official Star Wars Galaxies forums was Ood_Bnar, likely a reference to the Jedi Master Ood Bnar.
